trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow spy has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow spy to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow spy has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spy makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
